summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.2 mm), light levels (up 3388 lux), and cloud levels (up 475 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1408 m), rainfall (down 0.2 mm), and light levels (up 5726 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 474.6m lower than yesterday, 999.9m lower than past week, 1407.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1398.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. Chance of light rain, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
